storyInfo: Rhodes Island's Engineering Department often receives requests for research projects from cooperating parties. During a certain project, Corroserum not only exhibits poor work ethic, but even makes a very serious error that causes dire setbacks to the entire R&D effort.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Engineering Department
Practical Science/Technology Project Unit 13
'The Next Step in Corrosive Research, and Corresponding Protection Countermeasures'
Project Leaders: Corroserum, Astgenne
Good work, everyone.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Now if you don't mind...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: No sooner has Corroserum said this than he puts on his blindfold to take a break, as is his habit.
Good evening, Doctor.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Doctor.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Good evening.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Just passing by. All good here?;Any setbacks with your project?

attributes.content: If you're really curious...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Could I ask you to hold this up for a moment?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: No need to panic, the experiment will be conducted within controllable limits.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: The armor plate you're holding has our latest reworked protective coating applied, which should suffice to ensure your safety.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Sure. Just hold it like this?;Wait, safety? Mine?

attributes.content: As you can see, it has previously suffered a degree of corrosive wear. However, the improvement to our new coating technology lies not in anti-corrosion.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Care to begin, Astgenne? Please attack the plate with Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Hold up, isn't this method a little dangerous for an experiment?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.options: It's fine, I believe in your tech.;Relax, I can protect myself.

attributes.content: Your cooperation is greatly appreciated, Doctor.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Well, I... Okay, then...
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: That's right, this improved protective coating retains a level of resistance against Arts attacks even when corroded. That's new.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Of course, all credit is due to Astgenne and her efforts.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I have yet to achieve any particular breakthroughs on the corrosive front.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Sorry about this, Doctor. I need you to play along with me for one more attack.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Lightning, illuminate! Hah!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Thought so... It took such an excessive attack just to pierce the plate's defenses.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Oh, uh! You're okay, right? Sorry... I...
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.options: No worries, I'm fine.;That was one insane attack.;That was one tough defense.

attributes.content: Phew... Sorry.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: As should be obvious, this protective coating's strength has far exceeded the project goals.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: But it still hasn't reached the theoretical limit of the design.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: What if we took it a step further? I think there's a call for more testing.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: I agree, but I also wouldn't consider it wise to chase the theoretical limit.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I need to make a detailed record of the results of this trial.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.options: Honored I could be of help.;Likewise.

attributes.content: Doctor, it just passed six o'clock.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Please allow me to clock out for the day. Thank you very much for joining us for today's experiment.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Oh right, I have some candy from Quercus and Yanese tea from Mister Lee sitting on my desk. They're both excellent for relieving fatigue, so please feel free to help yourself.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: In any case... I'll see the two of you later.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Aren't you going to clock out too?

attributes.content: Oh... Don't worry about me. I might be working late again.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: I still need to do a bit more research and testing.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Stretches)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Phew... Time to head back!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Oops, music's a bit loud. Wouldn't want to disturb others. I'll have to turn it down a little.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Hmm hmm~ (Grooves along with the music)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Gotta turn on the humidifier since the room's a bit dry.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Project Lead Corroserum, are you in?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I have something for you.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: These are the materials you requested. Please sign here, if you don't mind.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Thanks a bunch. Go ahead and leave the stuff over in that corner.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: You can go after dropping it off. I'll sort it all out myself later.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: By the way, why'd you request so many discarded experimental materials? And not just from our team either.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: It's not work-related; just a personal hobby of mine.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: A personal hobby, huh... And for Astgenne, it was a personal idea.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: I really have no clue what the two of you are working on in secret.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Here's the receipt.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Did you need anything else?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Corroserum... When I left the lab just now, ours was the only one with the lights still on.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Astgenne hasn't been back to her room for days now. I think... you should go check up on her.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Raythean Industries Experimental Engineering Department
Come in.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Hello, everyone! I'm the new researcher, Corroserum, and my specialty is...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Alright, fill out these forms first and bring them over to the accountant's office by tonight.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Sure! If any of you need any help, feel free to give me a call.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Let's get started.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: On it!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.text: Yes, the person right there on the screen.

attributes.content: Not leaving yet?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: I'm not heading back today.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Not like I have anything else to do, so I might as well knock this out.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Relax, you still have plenty of time.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Yeah, I know. I just happened to have a flash of inspiration.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: You can head back first.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: By the way, Corroserum, how long have you been with the Engineering Department?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: ...About half a year?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Good luck then.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Yup!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.text: Did you get a good look at how they appear on the screen?

attributes.content: Corroserum, come here for a moment.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: It's been two years since you joined the Engineering Department, right? I've always seen you as an intelligent and hardworking young man.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Thanks, boss!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: So... There's a project, but it's not one of ours. It belongs to a friend of mine in the military, and they urgently need a new type of protective material for their soldiers.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: I can handle it.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I'm not joking around here. Think it through carefully—I have no way of sending you extra assistants, and you can't afford to fall behind in your day-to-day work here either.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Trust me, I can handle it.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Fine, do your best.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Will do!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.text: Do you still remember his name?

attributes.content: This data set... shouldn't be possible.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: How could he have missed such an obvious error?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: ...Weren't you supposed to be off work?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Sorry to bother you. I'm just back to pick up a file.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: And, I'll be taking my leave now.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Wait, hold on a second!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Hmm? Did you need something?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I did have a question, about the corrosive agent you were in charge of improving.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Ask away.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: You haven't made any progress with it for months now. Even when I joined up with the rest of the team, we couldn't move forward at all.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: True. Admittedly, development in this area has been more difficult than I imagined.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I've always had my suspicions, since from a data-perspective these kinds of results shouldn't be possible. But I never thought about it too much since I trusted you.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Until just now, when I checked the records of previous experiments and stumbled upon this...
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Your sample report.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Was there some sort of problem with it?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Was there a problem?!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: In each batch of samples you make, you use less of the active ingredient than we calculated for.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: In other words, the samples we've been testing over the last few months have all been incomplete, defective products!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: No wonder the experimental results of your corrosive agents have been so disappointing. This whole time, we've barely met the minimum project design requirements.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Sorry, this does appear to be a major oversight on my part.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: You're telling me you somehow managed to miss all this?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Yes, for which I deeply apologize.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Then can you make some new samples that actually match the data we're using?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Sorry, but not right now.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Because I'm off work.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Hey–!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: You'll have my complete cooperation tomorrow, but I really must get going.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Regarding the serious errors in my work, I will explain the situation to the Doctor myself, and take full responsibility for the consequences.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: In any case... See you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Corroserum!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.text: Corroserum faces himself in the mirror...

attributes.content: (Confront your work.)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (All of its facets.)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (All your different colleagues.)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (What expression would be the most appropriate?)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Corroserum, what the hell have you been doing?!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: This is what I get for trusting you so much!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: But... our data indicate that this performs twice as well as the original requirements.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: And it costs how much?! Do you have any idea how much we'd have to sell just to recoup our expenses?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Are you trying to lose us money here? Not to mention how the client is going to balk at the price tag.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: But, didn't you say they were your friend...?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Good grief... Young man...
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Step outside for a moment.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: But sir...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Get out!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Everyone! Put whatever you're doing on hold! We have an urgent project that needs to get done.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: What you were just issued is a new type of protective material that showed up on the battlefield.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: This?!
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Right now, one of our important clients urgently needs an agent that can deal with this protective material.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: We've been given a hard deadline of one month, so during this time I need everyone here to give it their all. No taking time off, no slacking! This MUST get done!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Does everyone understand?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Boss...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: This material... I think I've felt something very similar half a year ago...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Get to work already! If you have something to say, tell me later.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Did you hear me?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Yes, I understand.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Are all our people here?
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Yes, my colleague had something to attend to, so let's get started.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Very well... We've already received the data sheets you submitted, as well as tested the samples you gave us.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Without a doubt, they meet our standards when it comes to performance, quality, and other measures. However...
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Is there an issue?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: So here's the situation. We've been... having a number of internal reorganizations lately. A lot has changed.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: The new manager proposed a new target policy, and was dissatisfied with the performance of the current corrosive agent. He would like you to meet the following benchmarks.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: A corrosion index requirement as high as this... practically falls under the category of a WMD.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: It's... for personal protective use.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Also, for whatever reason, the budget for this project has been slashed.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Therefore, you might encounter some difficulties in terms of controlling costs and future development expenses. I hope you understand.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Sorry, but allow me to say something.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: First of all, I can't guarantee that we can meet these new benchmarks. It's something I'd have to discuss with my teammates first.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Second, an extended R&D cycle would inevitably lead to an increase in development costs. If you're going to cut the budget...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Um... In that case, how about removing some of the unnecessary protective systems? Just leave in the basic safety features.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: I must apologize, but making modifications to a chemical agent is not as simple as appending a line of text.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: But we're talking about removing functionality here, right? Surely that's not so difficult for professionals like you.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: And, regarding the budget... There's truly nothing I can do about that. However, internally we do acknowledge the excellent work you've shown us.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Which is why I think of these as hurdles we can overcome together. ...We are, of course, very sorry for the trouble.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: I trust we will have more opportunities to work together in the long-term.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: The one to make that decision will be...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Doctor?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Sorry, we can't accommodate these kinds of requests.

attributes.content: Understood. We'll discuss things again on our end.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.content: Apologies. In light of the current situation, our side has decided to terminate R&D on this project.
attributes.name: Customer Representative

attributes.options: Sorry all your hard work went to waste.;I'll ensure we're compensated for breach of contract.

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor. But I think this outcome is for the best.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Doctor! Impeccable timing as always!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: After a few days of comparing the old experimental data, I've finally found the problem! Here's a sample of the new corrosive agent.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Oh, and this time, you don't have to stand behind the armor plate. Just keep your eyes peeled!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Did you see that? The new agent completely ate through the previous version of the protective coating.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: But! But! For this new one, I've adjusted the way we approach our technical designs when it comes to the protective coating!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: What's wrong, Doctor?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Did something go wrong at the meeting?
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: It's not that big of a deal.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: The client felt that the existing agent achieved the desired effect, but wanted us to make improvements to the protective aspect.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Your hard work has given us a way forward for our future research.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Also, these materials can be used to keep our own operators safe in the future. Isn't that right, Doctor?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Yes, we'll be better protected.;...I appreciate both of your efforts.;Astgenne, take a break. That's an order.

attributes.content: Oh right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: There's something we have to talk about.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Thank you, Doctor!
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: We were simply doing what had to be done.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Oh right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: There's something we have to talk about.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Astgenne

attributes.content: Oh right, Doctor.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: There's something we have to talk about.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: So, during the research on the corrosive agent, I indeed made a mistake in the amount of a key ingredient.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I am willing to accept any consequences for my error.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: ......;Why didn't you tell the truth earlier?;Were you worried about Astgenne?

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: You do know what my area of expertise is, right?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: That's right. From the day I joined Engineering, I've been constantly going back and forth between corrosion and anti-corrosion in my research, encountering no shortage of setbacks and breakthroughs.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: But I never paid attention to my own protection, nor did I consider that the reagents were silently eating away at me.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Until one day, I realized that the things known as dreams, passions, and ideals are not so corrosion-proof after all.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: So... Why not let Astgenne keep believing in her work, Doctor?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Speaking of which, it's almost six o'clock.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: May I clock out now?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Ask away.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.options: Be honest. Was it really a mistake?

attributes.content: You know, Great Yan has an old adage about the spear and the shield. Mister Lee told me the story a while ago.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: When you hold the strongest shield, there will invariably be someone who wants to challenge it, to break through its limits. And from that was born the sharpest spear.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: And when the sharpest spear becomes undefeatable, there will invariably be someone who seeks to challenge its deadly strength. And from that was born the strongest shield.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: It is a never-ending cycle, one in which nobody can predict the end result.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Unless...
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: There is nobody left to pick up a spear or shield.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Ah... I didn't mean to go off on a tangent. In any case, I made a mistake in my work, and I'm solely responsible for it.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: But we can talk about this more at work tomorrow.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: After all, I'm off-the-clock.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Stretches)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Takes a deep breath)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Do you really want to know, Doctor?
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: I'm asking you, can it cause obvious damage to the target?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Absolutely. After all, that material was made with the same formula I experimented with once before.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Though I'm not sure how it made its way out into the wild.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Son of a gun...
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: And what's the current safe service life of this weapon?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Around thirty allowances of ammunition.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Can you make a bulk delivery in time?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: No, because we haven't finished testing. Those soldiers would be marching off to their deaths.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: Is there something wrong with you? Do I have to beat some sense into you?!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Our clients can't wait forever, and we have the stuff on hand right now! This is a business! This is how we put food on the table!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: People want something that works, meets their needs, and doesn't cost too much! That's all that matters!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: As for what happens to the soldiers, does any of that affect you in any way? Does it?!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Isn't thirty ammunition allowances' worth good enough? Who knows if the main forces can even use up that much.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: You're still young, so would it kill you to use your head and think outside the box for once?
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: I'm seriously disappointed in you.
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: (Is this really worth getting mad over?)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Of course it is.)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (That said...)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (This is just work.)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: (Why take it so seriously?)
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: What's with that look on your face?!
attributes.name: Senior Project Manager

attributes.content: Sorry, sir.
attributes.name: Corroserum

attributes.content: In that case... I'll head back to work first.
attributes.name: Corroserum
